From: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 16, 2025 10:29 PM
To: Mohammad Azam <mohammad.azam@mordorintelligence.com>
Subject: [EXT]Re: [EXT]Re: [EXT]Re: [EXT]Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #430176 - - [EXT]Gmail Accessible Only When VPN is On [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0Jdlye:ref ]

Hello Mohammad,

I trust you are well and Happy New Year to you.

Our R&D team was able to reproduce this issue by installing the Browsec browser extension. The fix that worked for us was to add the port 1022 under the "Deep Packet Inspection Ports & Settings" > "Custom Ports" like in the below screenshot.  Please note that the "Traffic Type" dropdown was set to "HTTPS".


[Image_2025-01-16_18-54-21.png]

Please let us know if this worked for you.


Kind regards
__________________

Can you confirm if the affected endpoints are part of a Content Aware Protection policy please? if yes, can you check to see what the policy type is please? See below screenshot.
Please check to see if "Outside Network" is selected as the policy type.

It would also be good to see what the current Deep Packet Inspection configuration settings are for the affected endpoints.  Can you send us a screenshot of the DPI configuration settings please (example below).  "Device Control" > "Computers" > ComputerName > "Manage Settings" > "DPI Configuration".

[Image_2024-12-18_13-09-40.png]




Kind regards

It would also be good to see what the current Deep Packet Inspection configuration settings are for the affected endpoints.  Can you send us a screenshot of the DPI configuration settings please (example below).  "Device Control" > "Computers" > ComputerName > "Manage Settings" > "DPI Configuration".

[Image_2024-12-18_13-09-40.png]
